page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: Lack of amenities in the region mean that most recreation is home based. Many of the families in the area are retired so{gardening}proved, in our survey, to be the most popular form of recreation, followed by {dress-making, knitting and {cake-decorating. Belsay has a{cricket pitch}which is well-used, but most active sportsmen choose to go to{Bolam Lake,}or to one of the local towns, for their facilities. Belsay is a rural area which abounds in{beautiful}walks and the families make good use of this, 40% claiming to walk daily for pleasure.
